name: Animal Cruelty Demo
description:
This is the Demo Version of Animal Cruelty, a darkly humoristic free retro point & click adventure game currently in developement.

Alter between three different animals who has to join together to escape the castle of the evil Doctor Petson! Solve puzzles, talk to odd characters and explore/use objects to progress through the game!

Demo Features:
* 2 Playable characters with distinct personalities!
* Retro oozing pixel graphics and animations!
* Cooperate with yourself to solve tricky puzzles!
* Loads of fun dialogue!
* Home made music and sound effects!
